com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes

Class DoorSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes.Sensors
      • com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes.DoorSensor

  • public class DoorSensor
extends Sensors
    DoorSensor is the sub-class of Sensor and contains the functionality of the door opened or closed along with communicating with the gateway
